short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome Extension to manage and automatically close inactive tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to tab overload and hello to a faster, more efficient browser! Tabsence helps you keep your browser clutter-free by automatically closing tabs after they’ve been inactive for a set period, saving both your time and system resources.

Simply set a time limit—choose between minutes, hours, or days—and Tabsence will take care of the rest. By reducing the number of unused tabs running in the background, you’ll free up valuable RAM and improve your browser's performance.

Key Features:

Custom Time Limits: Define inactivity thresholds to suit your 
workflow.

Automatic Tab Cleanup: Let Tabsence close idle tabs, freeing up your browser.

Boost Efficiency: Reduce memory usage and improve performance by closing unnecessary tabs.

Simple & Minimal Design: A clean, user-friendly interface for quick setup.

Reclaim your focus, save memory, and enjoy a decluttered browsing experience with Tabsence—your tabs, your rules.
